subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Manu Ginóbili finished with 24 points, complementing Tim Duncan’s monumental 33 points and 19 rebounds. The Spurs took a 2-1 lead in the best-of-seven series.
snippet: Manu Ginóbili finished with 24 points, complementing Tim Duncan’s monumental 33 points and 19 rebounds. The Spurs took a 2-1 lead in the best-of-seven series.
